lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: You're on the home stretch of your shift delivering groceries.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: The final house is your favourite: your mentor Sal's house.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: Every day he has some new piece of wisdom for you.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: Today is the day he promised to teach you the secrets of the magic missile.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: As you approach the house, something seems strange.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: You have a bad feeling about this.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: There are signs of a struggle...

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: You wonder why you are here.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: An orb! Dark tidings. Dark tidings, indeed.
